name: Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket-Powered Battle-Cars
description:
Take control of vehicles with incredible physics-based maneuverability, including boosters for launching high into the air or accelerating at break-neck speed on the ground. In the air, cars can roll, flip, jump, dodge and spin. In this team-based soccer inspired game, the vehicles maneuver to perform breathtaking saves, awe-inspiring shots on goal and gruesome demolishes of opponent cars.

• Huge array of multiplayer options including local and online matchmaking!
• Extensive stat tracking, rankings, and trophies!
• Register a team with your friends and work your way up the online leaderboard!
• Save your game and even edit the footage to upload to YouTube!
• Play in the single player tournament or unlock new cars in the mini-games!
